coreAttributes.name: demonstone sword
coreAttributes.description: A sword hilt which contains a powerful demonstone, the power of which can be used to imbue the hilt with elemental damage, forming an arcane blade.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(focus)] on the energy in the demonstone. As [npc.she] [npc.does] so, it dissolves and flows into [npc.her] aura, granting [npc.herHim] the ability to perform arcane-imbued unarmed attacks.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(focus)] on extracting the absorbed arcane energy inside of [npc.her] aura. As [npc.she] [npc.does] so, it reforms back into a clear demonstone.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] demonstone sword at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] demonstone sword, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] demonstone sword, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] demonstone sword at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] demonstone sword, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] demonstone sword, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
